body: @alexcrichton this is ready for a look
:umbrella: The latest upstream changes (presumably #27937) made this pull request unmergeable. Please resolve the merge conflicts.
The travis failure here seems worrisome?
Yeah, I'll take a look tomorrow; out of time for the day!
@alexcrichton PTAL. I've taken out the `configure` changes which were troublesome.
@bors: r+ b31fee81d43f5ebc2ceb02b18c84b525710680ba
Ah wonderful! I had looked into trying to do this a while back, and didn't do it. Bravo! :+1: :100:
There's also an open issue that this closes.... hm
@steveklabnik I wouldn't close that issue; this is only the tip of the iceberg :crying_cat_face:
Ah, cool :) still good regardless.
